titles.title: Hardship Outlays to protect Mortgagee Equity (HOME) Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide penalty free distributions from certain retirement plans for mortgage payments with respect to a principal residence and to modify the rules governing hardship distributions.
Hardship Outlays to protect Mortgagee Equity (HOME) Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Hardship Outlays to protect Mortgagee Equity (HOME) Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to withdraw amounts from their tax-exempt pension and retirement plans, without incurring the 10% penalty otherwise imposed on such withdrawals, to make mortgage payments on their principal residences.
